channel.title: Im desperate... Still that cache error
channel.description:
Hello!
Day 4, still with the cache error... I really don't know what to do. But i thought about this. What if i just give the cache to the players? So if they go on my website to download the client, they download a folder, and inside there is the client.jar and the ballscapecache, so the client looks for the cache in the same folder where they are. Is that possible? Cause i'm getting tired of this stuff...
I just noticed this: i don't have a cachedownloader.java and class? The download thingy for the cache is in client.java? Would that be the problem?
Greetz Qeruina

item.title: Im desperate... Still that cache error
item.dc:creator: @qeruina qeruina
item.description:
@qeruina wrote:

Hello!

Day 4, still with the cache error… I really don’t know what to do. But i thought about this. What if i just give the cache to the players? Is that possible? Cause i’m getting tired of this stuff…
